title: LocalJumpError - no block given (yield)
body:
:show Model (with and without association) throws an Error:

```
ActionView::Template::Error (no block given (yield)):
    1: insert_tag renderer_for(:show)
```

The activeadmin index of `Order` (`http://localhost:3000/admin/orders/`) works as expected. However, "show" throws an error.

What do I do wrong?

``` Ruby
Class Customer < ActiveRecord::Base
  has_many :orders
end

Class Order < ActiveRecord::Base
  belongs_to :customer
end
```

```
ActiveAdmin.register Order do
  belongs_to :customer, optional: true
end

ActiveAdmin.register Customer do
  sidebar "Order Details", only: [:show, :edit] do
    ul do
      li link_to("Orders", admin_customer_orders_path(customer))
    end
  end
end
```

